name: Keep Calm and Fix That Ship
name_original: Keep Calm and Fix That Ship
description:
Game made for ONE MINUTE JAM #5

You only have one minute to escape a planet before it explodes. Fix your ship, hit the red button and save your life.

(obs: The game has some bugs, but I'll work on them after Jam).

CONTROLS:

  • MOVE: W,A,S,D
  • IN TASKS: Mouse

Game by Róger Goulart (instagram: @roger_goulart)
